name: VSMobileCenterUpload
description: Upload mobile app packages to Visual Studio Mobile Center
helpMarkDown: Upload mobile app packages to Visual Studio Mobile Center
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: Mobile Center Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your Visual Studio Mobile Center connection. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service endpoint.

inputs.name: appSlug
inputs.label: App Slug
inputs.helpMarkDown: The app slug is in the format of **{username}/{app_identifier}**. To locate **{username}** and **{app_identifier}** for an app, click on its name from https://mobile.azure.com/apps, and the resulting URL is in the format of [https://mobile.azure.com/users/{username}/apps/{app_identifier}](https://mobile.azure.com/users/{username}/apps/{app_identifier}). If you are using orgs, the app slug is of the format **{orgname}/{app_identifier}**.

inputs.name: app
inputs.label: Binary File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the APK or IPA file you want to publish

inputs.name: symbolsPath
inputs.label: Symbols Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the symbols folder.

inputs.name: pdbPath
inputs.label: Symbols Path (*.pdb)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to PDB symbols files. Path may contain wildcards.

inputs.name: dsymPath
inputs.label: dSYM Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to dSYM folder. Path may contain wildcards.

inputs.name: mappingTxtPath
inputs.label: Mapping File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to Android's mapping.txt file.

inputs.name: packParentFolder
inputs.label: Include All Items in Parent Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Upload the selected symbols file or folder and all other items inside the same parent folder. This is required for React Native apps.

inputs.name: releaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release Notes File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a UTF-8 encoded text file which contains the Release Notes for this version.

inputs.name: distributionGroupId
inputs.label: Distribution Group ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID of the distribution group app will deploy to. Leave it empty to use the default group.

instanceNameFormat: Deploy $(app) to Visual Studio Mobile Center

messages.NoApiTokenFound: No API token found on Visual Studio Mobile Center connection.
messages.Succeeded: Visual Studio Mobile Center Upload Task succeeded
messages.CannotFindAnyFile: Cannot find any file based on %s.
